item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

How do you make the a fun pk area? like i want to make it in a area this area isnt in wilderness but i want to make this area that u able to attack other and they keep item on death

here the codeof cords and area i wanna make safe and able to attack

public boolean isInFunPk() { if((absX >= 2383 && absX <= 2408 && absY >= 3481 && absY <=3495)) return true; else return false; }

also got that

        if(isInFunPk()) return false;

please help

Read full topic
